name: glitchedoverview
description: A nodejs script to capture an party overview picture with fragments between a time interval.

scripts.build: babel --presets=es2015 src/index.es6 --out-file bin/index.js && babel --presets=es2015 lib/glitchedOverview.es6 --out-file lib/glitchedOverview.js;

author: MacLovin
